bomberman.core.graphics
Class DecoratedEntityEngine

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.graphics.DecoratedEntityEngine

public class DecoratedEntityEngine
extends java.lang.Object

The DecoratedEntityEngine class manages the GfxObject acting in the. DecoratedWorld the same as EntityEngine does.

Author:
Federico Scozzafava
See Also:
EntityEngine, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decorator_pattern
